more.about:
Phattys is a place for anyone looking find a relaxing environment with friendly staff and great customers!
We ensure all our customers are treated with the best care and attention and served the coldest beers in Saigon and the most delicious pub grub around.
We have many large flat screen TV's and a projector screen where we show live sport 24/7. We are able to show as many live sports as we have TV's at the same time.
Our sport Range includes: - AFL - NRL - Rugby - Cricket - Football - Golf - Motorsport - Horse Racing - U FC - Tennis - and anything else you can think of. Seriously.
Our managers are always around to help so never hesitate to contact us or speak to them directly.
Hope to see you down here!!
